CustomField.description: If your event is paid and you want to provide a PayPal Payment option during checkout, set the Payment Gateway (PayPal) where money should be processed through.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If your event is paid and you want to provide a PayPal Payment option during checkout, set the Payment Gateway (PayPal) where money should be processed through.
CustomField.label: Payment Gateway (PayPal)
